"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5540629f63687221242b2700#post_5540629f63687221242b2700
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]Okay, here's something I don't get. If Jack, Crow, and Yusei are considered heroes by not only Satellite but also Neo Domino City, why do Yusei and Crow still have their Markers? They aren't wanted by Security and everyone seems to love them. Why do they have them? Can the Public Safety Bureau not remove Markers once they've been placed? And if so why would they make something like that permanent?[/bq]
To avoid the cutoff
